sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN booking_status='IssuedBusiness' THEN 1 END) as bookings FROM sme_analytics.sme_leadbookingrevenue WHERE investmenttypeid IN (5) AND DATE(leaddate) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND ( LOWER(CAST(mkt_category AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%icici lombard%%' OR LOWER(CAST(leadcreationsource AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%icici lombard%%' OR LOWER(CAST(booking_status AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%icici lombard%%' OR LOWER(CAST(insurername AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%icici lombard%%' OR LOWER(CAST(insurerfullname AS VARCHAR)) LIKE '%%icici lombard%%' )
